[-68][-28]I always wanted to leave my country|and go somewhere else.
[-15][9]I always wanted to come to France.
[9][34]So, one day when I was 17, I left.
[46][66]There I was in Paris.
[96][137]Since I was a bit naive,
[144][185]everyone seemed beautiful|and fabulous.
[190][232]/I couldn't tell cruelty from kindness.
[234][277]/For me, people were|/the way they were.
[281][316]/You just worked with them|/or talked with them.
[326][359]Obviously, it was a big shock.
